mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum,BOARD_NUM,BOARD_NAME,BOARD_SUBJECT,BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_RE_REF,BOARD_RE_LEV,BOARD_RE_SEQ,BOARD_READCOUNT, BOARD_DATE from (select * from fboard order by BOARD_RE_REF desc,BOARD_RE_SEQ asc)) where rnum >= ((#{page}-1) * 10+1) and rnum <= (#{page} * 10)
mapper.update: update FBoard set board_re_seq=board_re_seq+1 where board_re_ref=#{board_re_ref} and board_re_seq > #{board_re_seq}
